  2. org.opengis.metadata.distribution

Uses of Package
org.opengis.metadata.distribution

Packages that use org.opengis.metadata.distribution
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso
Root package for ISO 19115 metadata about resources (data or services).
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.distribution
Information about the options for obtaining a resource (data or service).
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.identification
Information to uniquely identify the data or service.
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.quality
Information about data quality, accuracy and consistency of a dataset.
org.apache.sis.storage
Data store base types for retrieving and saving geospatial data in various storage formats.
org.opengis.metadata
Root package for metadata.
org.opengis.metadata.distribution
Distribution information.
org.opengis.metadata.identification
Identification information (includes data and service identification).
org.opengis.metadata.quality
Data quality and positional accuracy.

    Description
    Distribution

    Class
    Description
    DataFile
    Description of a transfer data file.
    DigitalTransferOptions
    Technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor.
    Distribution
    Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource.
    Distributor
    Information about the distributor.
    Format
    Description of the computer language construct that specifies the representation of data objects in a record, file, message, storage device or transmission channel.
    Medium
    Information about the media on which the resource can be distributed.
    MediumFormat
    Method used to write to the medium.
    MediumName
    Name of the medium.
    StandardOrderProcess
    Common ways in which the resource may be obtained or received, and related instructions and fee information.
